inclusion.criterion: clinical T1, T2, or T3 tumor size
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: histopathologic tissue diagnosis of breast cancer by core-type biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: biopsy-proven involvement of the axillary lymph nodes at initial presentation
inclusion.label: unknown
